entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 19.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
